channel.title: Starter pack

item.title: Starter pack
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Does any one know a starter command that works after you restart the server? I mean your traditional starter pack command like this one lets you get another after you restart the server:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(itemid, amount);
sendMessage(“You have gotten your starter.”);
starter = 0;
} else {
sendMessage(“you have your starter already.”)";
}

and you would make a int for starter. Any one got one that works after you restart the server?

Read full topic
